posts.title: Reducing corruption in East Kazakhstan
posts.text: As a result of recent inspections, a 15% decrease in the level of corruption in East Kazakhstan was noted. This is due to the increased incidence of corruption detection in the past year.

posts.title: Civil servants involved in fraud have been identified and detained
posts.text: Two days ago, civil servants involved in fraud were identified and detained. The suspects are accused of fraudulent manipulation of state Tendars.

posts.title: Citizens who reported cases of corruption and fraud were rewarded
posts.text: Over the past half a year, 15 citizens have been awarded for reporting cases of corruption and fraud.

posts.title: The school principal was convicted of fraud
posts.text: According to the data, the director made arbitrary penalties and extortions from schoolchildren and school teachers for 4 years, and also blackmailed employees to dismiss in case of refusal to pay the extortions.

posts.title: 4 law enforcement officers were fired
posts.text: Yesterday, 4 law enforcement officers were fired for accepting a bribe totaling 20,000,000 tenge.

posts.title: It was instructed to find new executors of the state order for the construction of a residential building
posts.text: It was instructed to find new executors of the state order for the construction of a residential building.
